stimulusHtml: Which of the following best describes the value printed by this code segment?

features.html:
In the following code segment,  num  has been assigned a positive  int  value.

 

int x = 0; 
int temp = num;
  
while (temp > 0) 
{ 
   x += temp % 10; 
   temp /= 10; 
} 
  
System.out.println(x);

choicesHtml: A count of the number of digits in  num
The average of the digits in  num
The sum of the digits in  num
Whether  num  is evenly divisible by 10
